woco_image_file.help: string, path to world coordinate image

step_image_file.help: string, path to step image to use for testing

ctrl_pts_action.help: string, select action to perform for control points, choose from 'try', 'retry', 'load'

ctrl_pts_mat_file.help: string, path to MAT file to load/save world coordinate control points (depending on selected action)

crop_xw.help: 2-element array, minimum and maximum x coordinates for crop in world coordinate units (m)

crop_yw.help: 2-element array, minimum and maximum y coordinates for crop in world coordinate units (m)

mask_manual_action.help: string, select action to perform for manual mask, choose from 'create', 'load'

mask_manual_mat_file.help: string, path to MAT file to load/save manual mask

hue_lim.help: 2-element vector, double, range [0, 1]. [minimum, maximum] HSV 'hue' included as sand in the mask

value_lim.help: 2-element vector, double, range [0,1]. [minimum, maximum] HSV 'value' included as sand in the mask

entropy_lim.help: 2-element vector, double, range [0, 1]. [minimum, maximum] entropy included as sand in the mask

entropy_len.help: scalar, integer, window size in pixels for entropy filter

morph_open_rad.help: scalar, double, radius of disk structuring element used in mophological opening filter

morph_erode_rad.help: scalar, double, radius of disk structuring element used in mophological erosion filter
